name: Isolated, the platformer with no jump button!
name_original: Isolated, the platformer with no jump button!
description:
Isolated is a platformer, where you must go vertically, by  moving horizontally!

Join the Discord Server if you want to become a playtester! : https://discord.gg/UdCApuF

Changelog :

Version 1.1 : Added the Booster Pad, 3 levels and a level picker.

Version 1.2 : Added 1 more level
